patterns: what is the welcome message for students who buy a course worth more than Re 1

patterns: Can you make video solutions for mock tests
responses: We conduct live doubt-clearing sessions of all the Mocks held in the week on Saturdays and Sundays. The Classes are on Google Meet, and the link can be found in the announcement section of the course, and the recordings are also uploaded in the Google sheet.

patterns: what is the percentage of seats reserved for SC candidates
responses: 15% of seats are reserved for Scheduled Caste (SC) candidates.

patterns: Do you have any idea about the reopening of the correction window for IAT
responses: We do not have any information about the reopening of the correction window for IAT.

patterns: how is the merit list calculated
responses: The merit list considers the best three qualifying scores, omitting the section with the worst score. Therefore, attempting all sections is advantageous.

patterns: how many programs will candidates be shown across IISERs
responses: Candidates will be shown 9 programs across 7 iisERs (or 7 programs across 7 iisERs if they did not have Mathematics as a subject in class Xii)

patterns: Who are some of the top rankers from sciastra

responses: Some of the top rankers from sciastra include Adarsh V (Rank 1 in iAT 2021), Dhritiraj (Rank 1 in Assam Board 2021), Adityarup (Rank 13 in NEST 2021), and Apoorva (Rank 1 in KVPY 2021).

Some of the top rankers from sciastra in iAT 2022 include Dhritiraj Bastav Kalita, Kuhak Guha, Suhani Bhattacharyya, Sabarno Saha, Avik Devsharma, Devadarsh Kottarakoth, Anushka Vaibhav Joshi, Tanmay Pandey, Sai Shanmukh, Kasmita Singha, Nirmalya Upadhyay, aryan gupta, Mayuri Datta, Sharika, and Apoorva singh.

responses: IAT stands for integrated Admission Test. The maximum mark in IAT is 240.We have launched the Mock Test Series and Everything series.and documents required for IAT Application are Class X certificate, Class Xii (or equivalent examination), and a signed declaration form if the marks sheet is unavailable.
Yes, you will get all the recorded lectures from the start. You can watch them anytime at your convenient pace. Everything has been organised in the content section of the course.
We do not have any information about the reopening of the correction window for IAT.

patterns: Who are the authorities that issue Caste Certificates
responses: The authorities that issue Caste Certificates are District Magistrate/Additional Magistrate/Collector/Deputy Commissioner/Additional Deputy Commissioner/Deputy Collector/1st Class Stipendiary Magistrate/Sub-Divisional Magistrate/Taluka Magistrate/Executive Magistrate/Extra Assistant Commissioner (not below the rank of 1st Class Stipendiary Magistrate).

patterns: how are marks considered for IAT application
responses: a) if a board provides aggregate marks considering both Class Xi and Class Xii, only the Class Xii (or equivalent) exam marks will be considered. b) For boards that offer a 3-year diploma or equivalent duration courses, only the marks scored in the final year will be considered. c) The marks scored in the final two semesters will be considered for board..
Marks are considered based on the board's aggregate marks, final year marks for 3-year diploma or equivalent duration courses, and final two semesters for semester system boards.

patterns: what are the important rules to remember
what should i do if i have questions related to responsibility-taking
responses: The important rules to remember are: 1) We need to chat with students with all due respect. 2) This sheet needs should be continuously updated by Mr. Akhil and the members of the chat team. 3) any questions related to any responsibility-taking should be answered only if confirmed, or the student should be politely told to refer to the official website.

patterns: what is SMAS score
Will a higher SMAS score improve my position in the merit list
how can i improve my SMAS score
responses: SMAS score is a score assigned to students based on their performance in the exam.A higher SMAS score will improve your position in the merit list.You can improve your SMAS score by carefully selecting your strongest subjects and focusing on them.

patterns: what is the JEE Channel
what is the eligibility criteria for the JEE Channel
Do i need to appear for iAT-2023 if i apply through the JEE Channel
responses: The JEE Channel is a channel for admission to iisERs for candidates who have qualified in JEE (Advanced) in the year 2023. Candidates must have a rank within 15000 in the common rank list or in the respective category rank lists (GEN-EWS/OBC-NCL/SC/ST/PwD) and must have qualified JEE (Advanced) in the year 2023. Candidates with JEE (Advanced) preparatory ranks are not eligible.
No, you do not need to appear for iAT-2023 if you apply through the JEE Channel.

patterns: how many marks will be deducted for an incorrect answer
Will unanswered questions be awarded any marks
what is the marking scheme for multiple correct answer MCQs
what is the marking scheme for multiple correct answer MCQs
responses: One mark will be deducted for an incorrect answer.unanswered questions will not be awarded any marks.For multiple correct answer MCQs, choosing all correct answers without any wrong answers earns the candidate full marks (4 marks); otherwise, they receive 0 marks.For single correct answer MCQs, +25 marks are awarded for each correct answer, -1 mark for each wrong answer, and 0 marks for unattempted questions.

patterns: what is the deadline for submitting the marks sheet

what is the earliest time a candidate can leave the examination hall for the first session
what is the earliest time a candidate can leave the examination hall for the second session
what is the latest time a candidate can enter the examination hall for the first session
what is the latest time a candidate can enter the examination hall for the second session
responses: Candidates cannot enter the examination hall after 9:30 AM for the first session. The deadline for submitting the marks sheet is 7th July 2023.if you fail to submit the marks sheet by the deadline, you will not be allotted a seat in any of the iisERs.
The earliest a candidate can leave the examination hall is 11:00 AM for the first session, except for medical reasons.
The earliest a candidate can leave the examination hall is 4:30 PM for the second session, except for medical reasons.
Candidates cannot enter the examination hall after 3:00 PM for the second session.

patterns: is there any reservation for EWS candidates

responses: Yes, reservation for Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) is allowed in the General-EWS category for admission to CEBS.
EBC candidates are not eligible for reservation unless they satisfy the OBC-NCL criteria.
EWS candidates will be treated as a general candidate in NisER as there is no GEN EWS reservation.

patterns: what is the preparation strategy for completing my preparation in the time left

When do I get my delivery?
responses: The preparation strategy for completing your preparation in the time left is: 1) Start by solving pyqâ€™s and mock tests, these will help you analyse where you stand. 2) Now improve your strong subjects (mostly work on the important chapters). 3) Work on important parts for your weak subjects (revise as often as possible). 4) Also, you should know what NOT to do (anything challenging for not that).

responses: No, getting a rank does not guarantee an offer/admission to an IISER.
The total marks obtained by a candidate out of 240 will be considered for preparing the Rank List.
The purpose of the Rank List is to rank the candidates based on their total marks obtained out of 240.
No, not every candidate appearing in iAT 2023 will be awarded a rank.
